Senior Engineering Manager - Platform Engineering

We are seeking an experienced Senior Engineering Manager to lead our Platform Engineering team. This role requires strong technical leadership, team management experience, and expertise in cloud infrastructure.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of engineering management experience
- Experience leading teams of 10+ engineers
- Strong background in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Proven track record of improving team productivity and quality
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience managing distributed/remote teams
- Background in enterprise SaaS platforms
- Experience with infrastructure modernization projects
- Strong communication and collaboration skills

Key Responsibilities:
- Lead and grow a team of 15-20 engineers
- Drive technical strategy and architecture decisions
- Improve engineering processes and quality metrics
- Collaborate with product, architecture, and DevOps teams
- Manage team budget and resource allocation

This role reports to the Director of Engineering and offers opportunities for strategic impact and team growth.
